<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.legal_service_automation.cms" name="Legal Service Management CMS Portal" state="published" help="Legal_Matters" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true">
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.legal_service_automation" /> <import plugin="com.snc.service_management.core.cms" /> </requires>
<description>Manages legal matters and enables users to report and track matters. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate license. Contact ServiceNow for details. </description> </plugin>
]]></definition> <description>Manages legal matters and enables users to report and track matters. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate license. Contact ServiceNow for details.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Legal_Matters</help> <id>com.snc.legal_service_automation.cms</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Legal Service Management CMS Portal</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.legal_service_automation.cms/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.legal_service_automation,com.snc.service_management.core.cms</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>snc.legal_service_automation.cms</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
